Title: Bleakswords
Legend: Bleakswords leap into the fray in a blur of flashing steel. Wielding their duelling swords with unnatural grace, they slice their foes to ribbons with an unstoppable flurry of strikes.
Intro: Each model in a Bleakswords unit is armed with a Darkling Sword.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Thrall Warhost

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Lordling. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.

Rules.Name: Quicksilver Strike
Rules.Fluff: These warriors seem to move in the blink of an eye, unleashing lethal ripostes and counterstrikes.
Rules.Rule: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Darkling Sword is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound roll and save roll for each hit.
